alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 5:24PM CDT until March 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR CHICKASAW COUNTY... At 523 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Elma to 6 miles north of Ionia to near New Hampton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Fredericksburg around 530 PM CDT. Jerico around 535 PM CDT. Lawler around 540 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include County Roads B 33 And T 76, Boyd, Williamstown, New Hampton Airport, County Roads B 28 And V 18, Highway 18 And County V 18 and County Roads B 54 And V 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
